org.spongepowered.api.text

Interface TextElement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Advancement, PartitionedTextFormatter<E>, PlaceholderText, TextColor, TextFormatter<E>, TextRepresentable, TextTemplateApplier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClickAction, ClickAction.ChangePage, ClickAction.ExecuteCallback, ClickAction.OpenUrl, ClickAction.RunCommand, ClickAction.SuggestCommand, DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter, FixedPartitionedTextFormatter, HoverAction, HoverAction.ShowEntity, HoverAction.ShowItem, HoverAction.ShowText, LiteralText, LiteralText.Builder, MessageEvent.DefaultBodyApplier, MessageEvent.DefaultHeaderApplier, MessageEvent.MessageFormatter, ScoreText, ScoreText.Builder, SelectorText, SelectorText.Builder, ShiftClickAction, ShiftClickAction.InsertText, SimpleTextFormatter, SimpleTextTemplateApplier, Text, Text.Builder, TextAction, TextFormat, TextStyle, TextStyle.Base, TextTemplate, TextTemplate.Arg, TranslatableText, TranslatableText.Builder

    public interface TextElement
    Represents anything that can be applied to a Text.Builder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTo(Text.Builder builder)
      Applies this element to the end of the specified builder.

    • Method Detail

      • applyTo

        void applyTo(Text.Builder builder)
        Applies this element to the end of the specified builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - Text builder to apply to
